 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָמַס‎</span> **verb** ==trample== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְמַס‎</span>; compare perhaps Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***kick*** ([[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 33</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 196</sup>); <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***bury, and conceal grave***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְר‎</span> [[Mic.5.7|Mic 5:7]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְמֹס‎</span> [[Ezek.26.11|Ezek 26:11]]; [[Ps.7.6|Ps 7:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְמָסֿ‎</span> [[Isa.41.25|Isa 41:25]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּרְמְסֶנָּה‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.33|2Kgs 9:33]], etc.; ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִמְסִי‎</span> [[Nah.3.14|Nah 3:14]] ***Infinitive*** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְמֹס‎</span> [[Isa.1.12|Isa 1:12]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹמֵס‎</span> [[Isa.16.4|Isa 16:4]] — ***trample***, of men, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲצֵרָ֑י‎</span> [[Isa.1.12|Isa 1:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּצוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.26.11|Ezek 26:11]] (by horses' hoofs), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טִיט‎</span> [[Ezek.41.25|Ezek 41:25]] (in simile), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַחֹמֶר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Nah.3.14|Nah 3:14]], accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְעֶה‎</span> [[Ezek.34.18|Ezek 34:18]] (in figurative); ***trample down***, accusative of person, animal, or thing, [[2Kgs.7.17|2Kgs 7:17]]; [[2Kgs.7.20|2Kgs 7:20]], so (by horses' hoofs) [[2Kgs.9.33|2Kgs 9:33]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָאָרֶץ חַיָּי֫‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִר‎</span> [[Ps.7.6|Ps 7:6]]; [[Ps.91.13|Ps 91:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּדְרֹךְ‎</span>); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.63.13|Isa 63:13]] (figurative; +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּרַךְ‎</span>), subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶנֶל‎</span> [[Isa.26.6|Isa 26:6]] subject beast [[2Kgs.14.9|2Kgs 14:9]] (allegory) = [[2Chr.25.18|2Chr 25:18]]; [[Dan.8.7|Dan 8:7]] (vision), of horn, v[[Dan.8.10|Dan 8:10]] absolute of lion, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְטָרַף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְר‎</span> [[Mic.5.7|Mic 5:7]] (simile); participle as substantive collective ***tramplers*** (i.e. devastators) [[Isa.16.4|Isa 16:4]]. **Niph\`al** ***be trampled, Imperfect*** 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרַגֶלַיִם תֵּרָמַ֑סְנָה‎</span> [[Isa.28.3|Isa 28:3]] (on subject compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 183</sup>).
